title: BRIEF-Strad Updates Normal Course Issuer Bid
text:
BRIEF-Strad Updates Normal Course Issuer Bid

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 23:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Strad Updates Normal Course Issuer Bid Oct 3 (Reuters) - Strad Inc : * STRAD UPDATES NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID * UNDER CURRENT NCIB, COMPANY PURCHASED 1.69 MILLION CLASS A SHARES AT $1.60 * STRAD MAY PURCHASE UP TO AN ADDITIONAL 1.7 MILLION SHARES UNTIL END OF PROGRAM ON NOVEMBER 27, 2019 * STRAD BELIEVES THAT FROM TIME TO TIME MARKET PRICE OF SHARES MAY NOT REFLECT THEIR UNDERLYING VALUE

BRIEF-Strad Updates Normal Course Issuer Bid
description: BRIEF-Strad Updates Normal Course Issuer Bid
